content: round k2tog k1 round 2 knit around repeat rounds 1&2 till you have 28/32/36 stitches left in total 6 pattern by wildflower fibercrafts awildflowerslife blog main cable chart main cable chart written instructions 1 p3 k12 p3 2 p2 2/1 rpc 2/2 lc 2/2 rc 2/1 lpc p2 3-5 p2 k2 p3 k4 p3 k2 p2 6 p2 k2 p3 2/2 rc p3 k2 p2 7 p2 k2 p3 k4 p3 k2 p2 8 p2 2/1 lpc p2 k4 p2 2/1 rpc p2 9 p3 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p3 10 p3 2/1 lpc p1 2/2 rc p1 2/1 rpc p3 11 p4 k2 p1 k4 p1 k2 p4 12 p4 2/1 lpc k4 2/1 rpc p4 knit purl 2/1 rpc slip 1 stitch to cable needle and hold it in the back of the work knit the next 2 stitches purl the stitch off the cable needle 2/1 lpc slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold it in front of the work purl the next stitch knit the stitches off the cable needle 2/2 rc slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold it in the back of the work knit the next 2 stitches knit the stitches off the cable needle 2/2 lc slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold it in front of the work knit the next 2 7 stitches knit the stitches off the cable needle pattern by wildflower fibercrafts awildflowerslife blog ending cable chart ending cable chart written instructions 1 p5 k8 p5 2 p5 2/1 lpc k2 2/1 rpc p5 3 p6 k6 p6 4 p6 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc p6 5 p7 k4 p7 6 p7 2/2 lc p7 7 p18 8
